description:
This is a clip from episode #476 of the podcast with Tommy Robinson. In it, he and Dr. Peterson emphasize the need for freedom of speech and the importance of standing against censorship.

Unlock the ad-free experience of The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast and dive into exclusive bonus content on DailyWire+. Start watching now: http://dwpluspeterson.com/yt

title: Tommy Robinson Defends Himself
